name: Arrow Knights
description:
Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Fire: Spacebar, Enter, or Shift

There are/should be eight playable levels. Can you make it to the end and beat the blue snakes? (If so, please let me know, because I've been so busy making this game that I haven't tried beating it!)

Made with Godot, Aseprite, and Famitracker

For MiniJam 59: Fortress
